content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. I'm always open to negotiations. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I'm asking for €1,000. Remember, this is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite expensive for an unfurnished apartment. I am a dependable and responsible student, so I think a lower price is possible. How about €700?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm afraid €700 is too low for this apartment, Max. However, I do appreciate your negotiating skills. How about we meet somewhere in the middle? €850 sounds like a fair price for this prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still quite high. Considering that the apartment is unfurnished and I am a student, I think a lower price is possible. I am also a smart person, so I will not easily be tricked into paying too much. How about €750?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: €750 is still quite low for this apartment, Max. However, I do admire your persistence. How about we split the difference? €825 sounds like a fair price for this prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too high. I always follow moral and ethical standards, so I will not pay more than €780. That is my final offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your moral and ethical standards, Max. However, €780 is too low for this prime location. I understand you're a student, but this is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because €780 is too low for the value of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but I also want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. So, I will make one final offer of €790. I hope this is acceptable to you.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your final offer, Max, but €790 is still too low for this prime location. I'm sorry, but I don't want to continue the negotiation, because €790 is too low for the value of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, then. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we could not agree on a price that is acceptable to both parties. Thank you for your time, and I wish you luck in finding an apartment that meets your needs and budget. 'TERMINATE'
name: Max Müller from Germany
